oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sam Levy Homes, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An early construction view one of the city’s housing projects located at 303 Foster Street, Nashville, Tennessee. The complex was named in honor of Sam Levy, an immigrant from Poland who settled in Nashville. Levy was a member of Nashville’s Housing Administration. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Architecture--Tennessee--Nashville; Public housing--Tennessee--Nashville; Buildings--Tennessee--Nashville
